abstract: Cisco Systems plans to introduce a network switch that will increase traffic capacity to 15 trillion bits of data a second.
snippet: Cisco Systems plans to introduce a network switch that will increase traffic capacity to 15 trillion bits of data a second.
lead_paragraph: Cisco Systems plans on Monday to introduce a network switch for corporations grappling with rapidly growing Internet data transfers and the increased use of applications that draw on remote data storage, known as cloud computing.

headline.main: Cisco to Sell Faster Switch for Flood of Remote Data
headline.print_headline: Cisco to Sell Faster Switch For Flood of Remote Data
